Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class Circle
extends GeometricalObject
    Class representing a simple circle drawn in a single color defined in the constructor.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    MarkoB
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle(java.lang.String name,
      int x,
      int y,
      int r,
      java.awt.Color color)
        Class constructor. Constructor takes 5 arguments, name of the object, x and y coordinates of the circle center, radius and the color.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the object
        x - x coordinate of the center
        y - y coordinate of the center
        r - radius
        color - circle color

        public void modifyObject(DrawingModel model)
        Description copied from class: GeometricalObject

      • modifyComponent

        public void modifyComponent(int left,
                   int up)
        Description copied from class: GeometricalObject
        Method called when the image is being exported. It shifts the geometrical object so it fits the exported image.
        Specified by:
        modifyComponent in class GeometricalObject
        Parameters:
        left - number of pixels the x coordinate needs to be move to the left
        up - number of pixels the y coordinate needs to be moved upwards
